about_the_game:
Project Feline™ is a high-speed parkour action game with precise momentum-based movement and a 2000's anime art style. Play as Gabi, a feline-human fugitive searching for her lost family.

Ride any surface!

Run, climb, grind & slide across any surface with the grace of a feline and the precision of a gymnast.

Build insane momentum & uncover alternate routes!

Speed is not freely given, but earned through skilful conservation of momentum by performing consecutive parkour moves. Wield Gabi's momentum to reach alternate paths and shave vital seconds off your clear time.

Escape to a gorgeous 2000's anime world!

Project Feline's world and characters were made with advanced techniques to recapture the gorgeous hand-drawn look of 2000's anime in full 3D and in high-definition.

Follow the game's development!

Project Feline™ is in development and content presented is subject to change. Follow the devlogs and livestreams to stay updated!

Project Feline™ is a high-speed parkour action game with precise momentum-based movement and a 2000's anime art style. Play as Gabi, a feline-human fugitive searching for her lost family.

Ride any surface!

Speed is not freely given, but earned through skilful conservation of momentum by performing consecutive parkour moves. Wield Gabi's momentum to reach alternate paths and shave vital seconds off your clear time.

Escape to a gorgeous 2000's anime world!

Project Feline's world and characters were made with advanced techniques to recapture the gorgeous hand-drawn look of 2000's anime in full 3D and in high-definition.

name: Project Feline

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7, 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual-core processor, 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 11-compatible device
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: Integrated audio
  • Additional Notes: System requirements subject to change
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10, 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Quad-core processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX® 11-compatible device or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 11-compatible device or higher, 16-bit
  • Additional Notes: System requirements subject to change

reviews:
“A slick, stylish and addictive slice of parkour speedrunning.”
Alpha Beta Gamer
short_description: A high-speed parkour adventure! Run, grind & slide across any surface to build insane momentum. Blast through complex 3D stages in 2000's anime style.
